key.name: use-custom-shortcuts
key.summary: Use an alternative file for shortcut descriptions
key.description: If true the shortcut file specified as shortcuts-file will be used for custom shortcuts.

key.name: shortcuts-file
key.description: If not empty it points to the shortcut file that will be read for the shortcut descriptions.

key.name: show-icon
key.summary: Toggles the icon on the top panel
key.description: If true an icon to activate the extension will be visible on the top panel.

key.name: transparent-popup
key.summary: Toggles the transparency of the cheatsheet popup
key.description: Toggles the transparency of the cheatsheet popup.
